wikipedia_page.main: Saba Raleigh was the pseudonym of Isabel Pauline Rowlands, née Ellissen (b. 8 August 1862 – d. 22 August 1923), an English actress. On 31 March 1894 she became the second wife of Abraham Cecil Francis Fothergill Rowlands, the actor and playwright Cecil Raleigh, and was often billed as "Mrs. Cecil Raleigh".
